Function Documentation

function phantom_rods ( in  phobj,
in  discret_matrix_size_mm,
in  discret_matrix_size,
in  list,
in  fov_permit 
)

phantom_rods calculates permittivity distribution for rod phantom creates numerical phantom with rods using list of positions and values the permittivity value is calculated only for FOV region

Parameters:
discret_matrix_size_mm side 'matrix size' in milimeters
discret_matrix_size side matrix size [number of grid elements]
list vector of structures position (r,a), diameter and value for rods
fov_permit permittivity of field of view
Return values:
ph_map (matrix) permittivity
